name: Blind Man Brawl
description:
A true martial arts master can fight while blindfolded - sense out your opponent, and battle them in pitch darkness!

Basic Controls:

  • Move Left/Right: A/D
  • Punch/Kick: J/K
  • High/Low Block: U/I
  • Fireball: O
  • Close Game: ESC
  • Restart Fight: Backspace

Tips and Tricks:

  • Stop your opponent's fireballs with your own attacks.
  • You can block punches with high block, and kicks with low block.
  • Your opponent has fixed attack patterns. Memorize them to block their attacks perfectly.
  • Perfect blocks reward you with MP, use this to launch your own fireballs!
  • When contact is made, your opponent will be briefly visible.
  • Occasional lightning flashes will reveal your oppnent's position.
  • Use subtle visual and audio cues to judge your opponent's position, and predict their next move!

We recommend using headphones to gain the full experience.
